mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into tb_quancat (qname, qdesc, image, qprice, qtimes, qcoup, lastnum, holdnum, validshops, status, created, updated ) values (#{qname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qdesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qtimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{qcoup,jdbcType=REAL}, #{lastnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{holdnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{validshops,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: update tb_quancat set qname = #{qname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qdesc = #{qdesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image = #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qprice = #{qprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qtimes = #{qtimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, qcoup = #{qcoup,jdbcType=REAL}, lastnum = #{lastnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, holdnum = #{holdnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, validshops = #{validshops,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, created = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, qname, qdesc, image, qprice, qtimes, qcoup, lastnum, holdnum, validshops, status, created, updated from tb_quancat where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, qname, qdesc, image, qprice, qtimes, qcoup, lastnum, holdnum, validshops, status, created, updated from tb_quancat
